# ENTITY::SET_ENTITY_SORT_BIAS

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entity
* **FLOAT** bias

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Set a bias to be applied to an entity's sort distance

Only called once in the scripts.

Related to weapon objects.
